attributes.action: to allow the growing of cannabis at home for personal use!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many uk user of cannabis are honest working people!
if cannabis was leagalised it would take the control out of the dealers hands and
increase the goverments financial status.
120 gbp for an ounce that lasts a week.
prices would hopefuly be better in gov control.give us back our human rights please.
cannabis users are not bad people.
i would rather buy from a coffee shop or newsagent.
it would make the world a safer place for all! 
we would be able to be sure that what we are buying is what we are getting
come on tony m8 see scence please.

rejection.details:
There are a number of cannabis petitions already up which you may prefer to sign:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=cannabis
If you wish to resubmit your own, please do so.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
